shortcuts.title: Quick Search
shortcuts.description: Pressing __/__ puts the cursor in the module search bar at the top for easy navigation to a module's homepage.

shortcuts.title: Help
shortcuts.description: Pressing __?__ will quickly jump you to this [Help](/help) page.

shortcuts.title: Timetable
shortcuts.description: Pressing __T__ will quickly jump you to the [Timetable](/timetable) page.

shortcuts.title: Modules
shortcuts.description: Pressing __M__ will quickly jump you to the [Modules Catalogue](/modules) page.

shortcuts.title: Preferences
shortcuts.description: Pressing __P__ will quickly jump you to the [Preferences](/preferences) page.

shortcuts.title: Add modules to timetable
shortcuts.description: Pressing __.__ will focus on the search box where you can add modules to the timetable.

shortcuts.title: Show module's class schedule
shortcuts.description: Pressing __S__ will display the class schedule tab of the module.

shortcuts.title: Show Corspedia
shortcuts.description: Pressing __C__ will display the CORS bidding history tab of the module.

shortcuts.title: Show reviews and discussions
shortcuts.description: Pressing __R__ will display the reviews and discussions tab of the module.

shortcuts.title: Toggle modes
shortcuts.description: Pressing __X__ will switch between the light and dark modes of the site.

shortcuts.title: Switch theme
shortcuts.description: Pressing __←__ and __→__ will switch between the available theme colours for modules in the timetable.
